definitions.definition: An ancient writing implement consisting of a small rod with a pointed end for scratching letters on clay , wax -covered tablets or other surfaces, and a blunt end for obliterating them.

subdefinitions.definition: A small implement with a pointed end used for engraving and tracing .
A small device resembling a pen used to input handwritten text or drawings directly into an electronic device with a touch - sensitive screen.

definitions.definition: A hard- pointed pen -shaped instrument for marking on stencils used in a mimeograph machine.
A hard point , typically of diamond or sapphire , following a groove in a phonograph and transmitting the recorded sound for reproduction .

subdefinitions.definition: A pointed device formerly used to produce a groove in a record when recording sound.

definitions.definition: A tool for making small dots on a piece of heavy paper, used to produce Braille writing for the blind by hand .

main_definition: ( writing ) An ancient writing implement consisting of a small rod with a pointed end for scratching letters on clay , wax -covered tablets or other surfaces, and a blunt end for obliterating them.
secondary_definitions: A hard- pointed pen -shaped instrument for marking on stencils used in a mimeograph machine.
A hard point , typically of diamond or sapphire , following a groove in a phonograph and transmitting the recorded sound for reproduction .
A tool for making small dots on a piece of heavy paper, used to produce Braille writing for the blind by hand .
